side.description: Determines where to execute the specified action type. Accepts `"client"` or `"server"`
side.markdownDescription: Determines where to execute the specified action type. Accepts `"client"` or `"server"`

type.description:
## Side

---



[Meta Action Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/meta_action_types/side)

Executes the specified action type on the specified "side".




---

### Examples


```json
"entity_action": {
    "type": "origins:side",
    "action": {
        "type": "origins:change_resource",
        "resource": "example:resource",
        "change": 1
    },
    "side": "client"
}
```

This example will add 1 to the `example:resource` power on the client-side.
